name: rga-dashboard-complete
description: RGA Marketing Dashboard - Full Stack Application

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ..
scripts.dev: echo 'Please run backend and frontend in separate terminals' && echo 'Terminal 1: npm run backend:dev' && echo 'Terminal 2: npm run frontend:dev'
scripts.build: npm run backend:build && npm run frontend:build

author: RGA Team
